name: 2048 Jelly Style
description:
Most addictive Mobile version of 2048 Jelly Style Match 2 game and almost perfect 2048 number puzzle game for Android! Explore deep challenge for your mind!
-Game instructions-

the game you will see Jelly CHaracters and they are 13 of them need to keep matching the jellies
until you reach Zigohar the master Jelly and than you win the game

just need to swipe(UP,Down,Left,Right) to move all tile, when 2 tiles with the same Character touch, they merge into 1 character.
Swipe to move the tiles, when two tiles with the same Jelly touch, they merge into one.
Example: 2+2=4 ... 4+4=8 ... When a 2048 tile is created, the player wins.
[Game Features and Advantages]
+The only game version in Google play which works on almost EVERY android devices starting from 2.2+
+Swypes works for whole screen area
+Night mode for playing in bed
+Leaderboards
+You can keep playing for High-score after you reach the last jelly tile
+2048 Pro/Beginner Mode [UNDO ON/OFF]
+Smoothest Android version implementation!
+Frequent game improvements based on your feedback and comments

...We're Listening To You...
